features.featureTitle: Add a small frontend utility for building a shareable app link that points to the app’s main entry route using the current hash-based routing convention (e.g., `window.location.origin + '/#/'`). Reuse the existing clipboard helper behavior already used for invite links (`copyToClipboard` in `frontend/src/utils/inviteLinks.ts`).

Add a user-facing UI action to share the app itself by copying the app link to the clipboard. Place this action in an always-available location in the authenticated app shell (e.g., in the top navigation in `frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.tsx`). Use English user-facing text and the existing toast pattern (`sonner`) to confirm success/failure (e.g., success: “App link copied”, failure: “Failed to copy link”).
